Trigger: When Redgie is below the hydraulic press
column3: Uhhh…..Mags? I don’t wanna turn into a flat fridge magnet.

Trigger: IF Redgie dies under a press, after respawn
column3: Not blaming you…but I’m also not not blaming you.

Trigger: When the exit door is opened and the level is completed
column3: We’re really doing this…..I’m finally leaving the junk heap!;And it’s all thanks to you.;You may be quiet, but your steps?;They’re starting to speak. Loudly. Clearly. Purposefully.;I waited forever, but you made forever worth it.;Come on, let’s go find out what’s next!
